original_title: Sri Lankan Rupee continues to weaken against USD
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee (LKR) has depreciated further against the US Dollar (USD) today, according to the Central Bank of Sri Lanka.
Accordingly, the buying rate for USD today stands at Rs 321.10, while the selling rate is Rs 334.55.
Comparatively, on Friday, the buying rate for USD was Rs 318.72, with the selling rate at Rs 331.87.
The ongoing decline in the value of the Sri Lankan Rupee against the US Dollar has raised concerns among market participants and policymakers.
